actions.name: Therian Frenzy (Rage)
actions.description:
Trigger: While @Affliction[enraged].

Effect: The user takes 30% less damage, deals 30% more damage, receives triple the bonus to Movement from the Rush Action instead of double, and may use the Rush Action while @Affliction[enraged].

actions.name: Therian Frenzy
actions.description: Passive: The user receives double the bonus to Movement from the Rush Action. At the end of each of the user's Activations, they have a 30% chance to gain @Affliction[enraged] 3.
